name: Brick Break (autistmouse)
description:
Thank you for checking out this version of the classic brick breaking game Breakout. This version was made with G-Develop and features music, a score multiplier, intelligent high score memory within a game session, and sound effects.

Controls:

Left/Right arrow key to move paddle.

If you clear the bricks let the ball reach the bottom to log your score and play again.

Credits

Battle - Outlaw Pride

By: Joel Steudler

Obtained as part of asset pack bundle
